snippet: More hospitals and medical practices are adopting videoconferencing to treat patients, as Nantucket’s hospital has, finding that in many cases tele-treating can stand in for an office visit.
abstract: Some hospitals and medical practices are adopting videoconferencing technology as an affordable and effective way for doctors to examine patients without seeing them in person; method is especially useful in remote locations or in medical specialties that face a shortage of physicians.
lead_paragraph: More hospitals and medical practices are adopting videoconferencing to treat patients, as Nantucket’s hospital has, finding that in many cases tele-treating can stand in for an office visit.

headline.seo: Nantucket Hospital Uses Telemedicine as Bridge - The Digital Doctor
headline.main: With Telemedicine as Bridge, No Hospital Is an Island
headline.print_headline: With Telemedicine as Bridge, No Hospital Is an Island
